mapper.insert: insert into T_DIBAO_INFO (FAMILT_NAME, FAMILY_CODE, USER_WATER_ADDRESS, APPLY_TYPE, FAMILY_MAIN_NAME, THE_LINKMAN, MOBILE_PHONE, IDENTITY_NUMBER, DIBAOTEKUN_URL, IDENTITY_PICTURE_URL, TENANCY_AGREEMENT_FILE_URL, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED, DEL_FLAG) values (#{familyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useWaterAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{familyMainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dibaotekunUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityPictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenancyAgreementFileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},1, 0)
mapper.select: select FAMILY_CODE,USER_WATER_ADDRESS from T_DIBAO_INFO where FAMILY_CODE = #{familyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG = 1
